Up to Date (Daily Quiz)

Test your knowledge and challenge yourself with "Up to Date" the engaging Chrome extension that delivers a daily dose of trivia right to your browser. Perfect for quiz enthusiasts and curious minds alike, our fun, daily quizzes keep you sharp, informed, and entertained.

Features:

Quick Play:
Jump into a new set of questions every day, covering a wide range of topics from pop culture to history, science, and more. Each quiz is crafted to test your knowledge and provide a fun learning experience.

Spend just a few seconds a day to answer the quiz.
